alert.note: Alert for Brown; Callahan; Coleman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 3:07PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Callahan, northwestern Brown and northern Coleman Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 307 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Goldsboro, or near Novice, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cross Plains, Novice, Putnam, Burkett, May, Atwell, Cross Cut, Rowden, Silver Valley, Oplin, Lake Coleman, Admiral, Goldsboro and Us-283 Near The Coleman-Callahan County Line. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 317 and 319. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
